biotools.summary: BLUR (BLast Unexpected Ranking) is a tool designed to highlight, on the whole proteome level, protein divergences between species that result from divergence or loss of a domain and/or motif in a specific taxon. It is based on precomputed BLAST searches for a variety of model organism queries, allowing the study of all major life groups.

bioschemas.name: BLUR
